bio: My name is Shatilla, and I am currently a Senior at UNLV. I am going for my Bachelor of Science in Graphic Design. I have a lot of experience with development too. I took some Computer Science classes at UNLV. I also spend a lot of time learning about programming. I also spend time reading and experimenting. Over time I began to create things, and now I am obssessed with design and development. One of my favorite things to do is create small front-end apps for fun. My favorite language is javaScript. I love javaScript! It truly is the language of the web! If I had it my way, I would do nothing, but write it all day for the rest of my life. My second favorite language is C++. In my spare time, I enjoy trying new restaurants and spending time with family.

homePage.description: I am a Web Designer, Developer, Web Enthusiast, Shark Lover, and Student. Please take a look around.

interactivesPage.description: This page showcases various interactive web applications.

wipsPage.description: This page shows my current works in progress. These are projects that I am currently working on.

graphicsPage.description: Here is a showcase of my graphics work. Web, Print, and Gaming.

latest.title: Interactive Web Applications
latest.desc: You can view my latest work here. I have created many front-end applications that help assist students with learning online. Many of the students have been able to utilize my interactives in real life scenarios. These interactives provide skills and incorporate learning in a fun and productive way.

skills.name: Web Development
skills.desc: I use HTML5, CSS3, javaScript, and many frameworks such as Angular and React. I have understanding of REST patterns too. I also use back-end technologies such as PHP and SQL. I also have some experience with Laravel, Python, and Ruby. I mostly do front-end development, but am working more to develop my skills in back-end development.

skills.name: UI/UX Design
skills.desc: Web Design is where I began my journey. This interest goes back to when I was in high school. I studied on my own before college. I create my mockups in photoshop or illustrator. I use a lot of wireframes to make sure applications are efficient and elegant for the user.

skills.name: Graphic Design and 3D
skills.desc: I am a classically trained Graphic Designer too. I am majoring in graphic design. Besides web, I also do print design. I design things such as banners, logos, art works, brochures, business cards, branding, and much more.

skills.name: Application Development
skills.desc: I also have some knowledge of languages such as C++. I have created some applications for class. I do have an interest in creating applications for mobile phones and desktop computers.

interactives.name: Healthcare Learning App
interactives.description: This is a concept for an eLearning course to learn medical skills. This uses Angular 5 library.

interactives.name: Activity Planner
interactives.description: This is a custom planner used in an online UNLV course. This uses Angular 2 library.

interactives.name: Blood Pressure
interactives.description: This is a blood pressure application used in an online UNLV course. This uses jquery/javascript.

interactives.name: Binar Multimedia App
interactives.description: This is an ongoing project that I created for my web design class for a car system. It was made with angularJS.

interactives.name: Monster Genetics
interactives.description: This is an application used in an online UNLV course. It teaches students how genetics work. This uses jquery/javascript.

interactives.name: World Map (Past and Present)
interactives.description: This is an application used in an online UNLV course and UNLV Libraries. It showcases various books and media from all over the world. It also teaches students about the history of the past and present in english literature. This project uses angularJS.

interactives.name: Conventional Attributes
interactives.description: This was an exercise for an online course at UNLV. It uses chartJS and jquery/javascript

wips.name: Customized Planner
wips.description: This is a custom planner that will be a way for professors the generate their own planners. It is made with angular 2.

wips.name: 3D Topographical Map
wips.description: This is an experimental project that I did for UNLV Online Ed. It is a 3d map for a geology class. It uses BabylonJS.

graphics.name: Illustrated Cheetos
graphics.description: I drew this in Illustrator for a art project

graphics.name: Lipton Tea Package
graphics.description: Created in Illustrator for my package design project.
